mapper.select: SELECT * FROM system_administrator sa WHERE sa.USER_NAME = #{userName} AND sa.IS_VALID = 'Y'

SELECT sa.ID AS id, sa.NICK_NAME AS nickName, sa.HEAD_PORTRAIT AS headPortrait, sa.USER_NAME AS userName, sa.PHONE AS phone, sa.EMAIL AS email, sa.WEI_XIN AS weiXin, sa.QQ AS qq, sa.STATUS AS statusKey, sc.NAME AS statusName, DATE_FORMAT(sa.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS createTime, DATE_FORMAT(sa.UPDATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS updateTime, sa.IS_VALID AS isValid FROM system_administrator sa INNER JOIN system_token st on sa.ID = st.ADMINISTRATOR_ID LEFT JOIN system_config sc ON sc.KEY_WORD = sa.STATUS WHERE sa.IS_VALID = 'Y' AND st.TOKEN = #{token}

AND (sp.TYPE = #{type} or sp.MODULE = 'AM')
